p: Examining the relationship between gender and different preventive measures variables, it was found that women use soaps to a greater extent, disinfect clothing and footwear, wear protective mask, do not touch their face, do not shake hand with acquaintances, avoid contact with the elderly, do not see family members, disinfect petâ€™s paws. On the other hand, males only use disinfectants more ( Table 7).
